title: 81/259/EEC: Commission Decision of 27 March 1981 establishing that the apparatus described as 'JEOL electron microscope, JEM-100 CX, with goniometer EM-UHG- 1' may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 27 March 1981 establishing that the apparatus described as "JEOL electron microscope, JEM-100 CX, with goniometer EM-UHG-1" may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties (81/259/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The apparatus described as "JEOL electron microscope, JEM-100 CX, with goniometer EM-UHG-1", which is the subject of an application by the Government of the United Kingdom of 22 September 1980, may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 March 1981.
For the Commission
Karl-Heinz NARJES
Member of the Commission  (1) OJ No L 184, 15.7.1975, p. 1. (2) OJ No L 134, 31.5.1979, p. 1. (3) OJ No L 318, 13.12.1979, p. 32.
